Noelle Stevenson's original graphic novel has one of the most imaginative stories I've ever seen, and this movie did an amazing job adapting it. Although there were slight modifications to the story, it was still an awesome movie, and I had so much fun watching it. The animation was beautiful, the story was compelling, and the characters were so fun and vibrant in their own unique ways. I definitely recommend it for animation and fantasy fans!

It has been after a long time I am writing a review of any movie that I have watched. 'Nimona' is animated movie seen after a long time that touched my heart. The characters, the story, the animation; everything spot on. The film that is a fun right from the word go till the end. Top of the shelf Netflix animated films. It rests with Netflix another animated hit 'Klaus'. I recommend to watch it with your kids, friends, spouses. A must watch for people of all ages. Going to watch it again and again and again. Lastly, it is the first time I am watching animated film with the voice of "Riz Ahmed" and boy, I am not disappointed.

I would have liked more time with these characters, because at the climax of the movie when Nimona dies i didnt reallly feel any emotion, because of the lack of time with these people. The animation was good but not on the level of others like Spider verse and PB2. On the representation, i dont really have an opinion. Like its good that theres rep I guess but Ballister and Ambrosius are not giving there time together that much. I like the nacho seen tho. Should see the movie if you like things in the same vein.
